verses.niv: 4 Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud. 5 It is not rude, it is not self-seeking, it is not easily angered, it keeps no record of wrongs. 6 Love does not delight in evil but rejoices with the truth. 7 It always protects, always trusts, always hopes, always perseveres.
verses.kjv: 4 Charity suffereth long, and is kind; charity envieth not; charity vaunteth not itself, is not puffed up, 5 Doth not behave itself unseemly, seeketh not her own, is not easily provoked, thinketh no evil; 6 Rejoiceth not in iniquity, but rejoiceth in the truth; 7 Beareth all things, believeth all things, hopeth all things, endureth all things.
verses.esv: 4 Love is patient and kind; love does not envy or boast; it is not arrogant 5 or rude. It does not insist on its own way; it is not irritable or resentful; 6 it does not rejoice at wrongdoing, but rejoices with the truth. 7 Love bears all things, believes all things, hopes all things, endures all things.

verses.niv: 24 For this reason a man will leave his father and mother and be united to his wife, and they will become one flesh.
verses.kjv: 24 Therefore shall a man leave his father and his mother, and shall cleave unto his wife: and they shall be one flesh.
verses.esv: 24 Therefore a man shall leave his father and his mother and hold fast to his wife, and they shall become one flesh.

verses.niv: 18 The LORD God said, "It is not good for the man to be alone. I will make a helper suitable for him."
verses.kjv: 18 And the LORD God said, It is not good that the man should be alone; I will make him an help meet for him.
verses.esv: 18 Then the LORD God said, “It is not good that the man should be alone; I will make him a helper fit for him.”

verses.niv: 14 Do not be yoked together with unbelievers. For what do righteousness and wickedness have in common? Or what fellowship can light have with darkness?
verses.kjv: 14 Be ye not unequally yoked together with unbelievers: for what fellowship hath righteousness with unrighteousness? and what communion hath light with darkness?
verses.esv: 14 Do not be unequally yoked with unbelievers. For what partnership has righteousness with lawlessness? Or what fellowship has light with darkness?

verses.niv: 18 Flee from sexual immorality. All other sins a man commits are outside his body, but he who sins sexually sins against his own body.
verses.kjv: 18 Flee fornication. Every sin that a man doeth is without the body; but he that committeth fornication sinneth against his own body.
verses.esv: 18 Flee from sexual immorality. Every other sin a person commits is outside the body, but the sexually immoral person sins against his own body.

verses.niv: 1 Therefore, I urge you, brothers, in view of God's mercy, to offer your bodies as living sacrifices, holy and pleasing to God--this is your spiritual act of worship. 2 Do not conform any longer to the pattern of this world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind. Then you will be able to test and approve what God's will is--his good, pleasing and perfect will.
verses.kjv: 1 I beseech you therefore, brethren, by the mercies of God, that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable unto God, which is your reasonable service. 2 And be not conformed to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind, that ye may prove what is that good, and acceptable, and perfect, will of God.
verses.esv: 12:1 I appeal to you therefore, brothers, by the mercies of God, to present your bodies as a living sacrifice, holy and acceptable to God, which is your spiritual worship. 2 Do not be conformed to this world, but be transformed by the renewal of your mind, that by testing you may discern what is the will of God, what is good and acceptable and perfect.

verses.niv: 8 Above all, love each other deeply, because love covers over a multitude of sins.
verses.kjv: 8 And above all things have fervent charity among yourselves: for charity shall cover the multitude of sins.
verses.esv: 8 Above all, keep loving one another earnestly, since love covers a multitude of sins.

verses.niv: 19 The acts of the sinful nature are obvious: sexual immorality, impurity and debauchery; 20 idolatry and witchcraft; hatred, discord, jealousy, fits of rage, selfish ambition, dissensions, factions 21 and envy; drunkenness, orgies, and the like. I warn you, as I did before, that those who live like this will not inherit the kingdom of God.
verses.kjv: 19 Now the works of the flesh are manifest, which are these; Adultery, fornication, uncleanness, lasciviousness, 20 Idolatry, witchcraft, hatred, variance, emulations, wrath, strife, seditions, heresies, 21 Envyings, murders, drunkenness, revellings, and such like: of the which I tell you before, as I have also told you in time past, that they which do such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God.
verses.esv: 19 Now the works of the flesh are evident: sexual immorality, impurity, sensuality, 20 idolatry, sorcery, enmity, strife, jealousy, fits of anger, rivalries, dissensions, divisions, 21 envy, drunkenness, orgies, and things like these. I warn you, as I warned you before, that those who do such things will not inherit the kingdom of God.

verses.niv: 11 Therefore encourage one another and build each other up, just as in fact you are doing.
verses.kjv: 11 Wherefore comfort yourselves together, and edify one another, even as also ye do.
verses.esv: 11 Therefore encourage one another and build one another up, just as you are doing.

verses.niv: 7 Husbands, in the same way be considerate as you live with your wives, and treat them with respect as the weaker partner and as heirs with you of the gracious gift of life, so that nothing will hinder your prayers.
verses.kjv: 7 Likewise, ye husbands, dwell with them according to knowledge, giving honour unto the wife, as unto the weaker vessel, and as being heirs together of the grace of life; that your prayers be not hindered.
verses.esv: 7 Likewise, husbands, live with your wives in an understanding way, showing honor to the woman as the weaker vessel, since they are heirs with you of the grace of life, so that your prayers may not be hindered.

verses.niv: 25 Husbands, love your wives, just as Christ loved the church and gave himself up for her
verses.kjv: 25 Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the church, and gave himself for it;
verses.esv: 25 Husbands, love your wives, as Christ loved the church and gave himself up for her,

verses.niv: 10 A wife of noble character who can find? She is worth far more than rubies.
verses.kjv: 10 Who can find a virtuous woman? for her price is far above rubies.
verses.esv:
10    An excellent wife who can find?
    She is far more precious than jewels.

verses.niv: 23 Above all else, guard your heart, for it is the wellspring of life.
verses.esv:
23   Keep your heart with all vigilance,
    for from it flow the springs of life.
verses.kjv: 23 Keep thy heart with all diligence; for out of it are the issues of life.

verses.niv: 17 A friend loves at all times, and a brother is born for adversity.
verses.kjv: 17 A friend loveth at all times, and a brother is born for adversity.
verses.esv:
17   A friend loves at all times,
    and a brother is born for adversity.

verses.niv: 22 "'Do not lie with a man as one lies with a woman; that is detestable.
verses.kjv: 22 Thou shalt not lie with mankind, as with womankind: it is abomination.
verses.esv: 22 You shall not lie with a male as with a woman; it is an abomination.

verses.niv: 27 "You have heard that it was said, 'Do not commit adultery.' 28 But I tell you that anyone who looks at a woman lustfully has already committed adultery with her in his heart.
verses.kjv: 27 Ye have heard that it was said by them of old time, Thou shalt not commit adultery: 28 But I say unto you, That whosoever looketh on a woman to lust after her hath committed adultery with her already in his heart.
verses.esv: 27 “You have heard that it was said, ‘You shall not commit adultery.’ 28 But I say to you that everyone who looks at a woman with lustful intent has already committed adultery with her in his heart.

verses.niv: 2 Be completely humble and gentle; be patient, bearing with one another in love. 3 Make every effort to keep the unity of the Spirit through the bond of peace.
verses.kjv: 2 With all lowliness and meekness, with longsuffering, forbearing one another in love; 3 Endeavouring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace.
verses.esv: 2 with all humility and gentleness, with patience, bearing with one another in love, 3 eager to maintain the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace.

verses.niv: 33 However, each one of you also must love his wife as he loves himself, and the wife must respect her husband.
verses.kjv: 33 Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself; and the wife see that she reverence her husband.
verses.esv: 33 However, let each one of you love his wife as himself, and let the wife see that she respects her husband.

verses.niv: 4 Marriage should be honored by all, and the marriage bed kept pure, for God will judge the adulterer and all the sexually immoral.
verses.kjv: 4 Marriage is honourable in all, and the bed undefiled: but whoremongers and adulterers God will judge.
verses.esv: 4 Let marriage be held in honor among all, and let the marriage bed be undefiled, for God will judge the sexually immoral and adulterous.

verses.niv: 9 But if they cannot control themselves, they should marry, for it is better to marry than to burn with passion.
verses.kjv: 9 But if they cannot contain, let them marry: for it is better to marry than to burn.
verses.esv: 9 But if they cannot exercise self-control, they should marry. For it is better to marry than to burn with passion.

verses.niv: 12 "Honor your father and your mother, so that you may live long in the land the LORD your God is giving you.
verses.kjv: 12 Honour thy father and thy mother: that thy days may be long upon the land which the LORD thy God giveth thee.
verses.esv: 12 “Honor your father and your mother, that your days may be long in the land that the LORD your God is giving you.

verses.niv: 14 Houses and wealth are inherited from parents, but a prudent wife is from the LORD.
verses.kjv: 14 House and riches are the inheritance of fathers and a prudent wife is from the LORD.
verses.esv:
14   House and wealth are inherited from fathers,
    but a prudent wife is from the LORD.

verses.niv: 33 Do not be misled: "Bad company corrupts good character."
verses.kjv: 33 Be not deceived: evil communications corrupt good manners.
verses.esv: 33 Do not be deceived: “Bad company ruins good morals.”

verses.niv: 18 Wives, submit to your husbands, as is fitting in the Lord. 19 Husbands, love your wives and do not be harsh with them.
verses.kjv: 18 Wives, submit yourselves unto your own husbands, as it is fit in the Lord. 19 Husbands, love your wives, and be not bitter against them.
verses.esv: 18 Wives, submit to your husbands, as is fitting in the Lord. 19 Husbands, love your wives, and do not be harsh with them.

verses.niv: 1 Children, obey your parents in the Lord, for this is right. 2 "Honor your father and mother"--which is the first commandment with a promise-- 3 "that it may go well with you and that you may enjoy long life on the earth."
verses.kjv: 1 Children, obey your parents in the Lord: for this is right. 2 Honour thy father and mother; (which is the first commandment with promise;) 3 That it may be well with thee, and thou mayest live long on the earth.
verses.esv: 6:1 Children, obey your parents in the Lord, for this is right. 2 “Honor your father and mother” (this is the first commandment with a promise), 3 “that it may go well with you and that you may live long in the land.”
